verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of Solomon.) Unless <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> builds <S%H1129><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> They labor <S%H5998><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%> who build <S%H1129><s%> it; Unless <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> guards <S%H8104><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> The watchman <S%H8104><s%> keeps <S%H8245><s%> awake <S%H8245><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>

It is vain <S%H7723><s%> for you to rise <S%H6965><s%> up early, <S%H7925><s%> To retire <S%H3427><s%> late, <S%H309><s%> To eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of painful <S%H6089><s%> labors; <S%H6089><s%> For He gives <S%H5414><s%> to His beloved <S%H3039><s%> [even in his] sleep. <S%H8142><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> are a gift <S%H5159><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb <S%H990><s%> is a reward. <S%H7939><s%>
Like arrows <S%H2671><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a warrior, <S%H1368><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> are the children <S%H1121><s%> of one's youth. <S%H5271><s%>

How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> quiver <S%H827><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of them; They shall not be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> they speak <S%H1696><s%> with their enemies <S%H340><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
